name: Blood Grinder RPG
description:
This is an open world RPG-maker game which focuses mostly on a rich and varied combat style by making every class feel unique to play, there is no real story in the game in this prototype. My goal with this release is to mostly test these features and combat oriented mechanics, get feedback on what to improve/change and implement that, i call this a prototype as its continued development may vary depending on player involvement or interest.

"beta" Features : 

- First 3 zones with 2 dungeons and 3 boss fights

- A lot of side stuff to do and explore

- Lots of different accessories to spice up your playstyle

- 7 different classes to play as

- Interactive enviroment where every nook and cranny has something to say

Disclaimers :

- The game uses songs from the SMT and La Mulana series (placeholders)

- The game uses altered sprites from retro square enix games (ex. Final fantasy)
